mapper.select: SELECT T2.LETTER_NO AS LETTER_NO FROM TBL_USER TU INNER JOIN ( SELECT MAX(LETTER_NO) AS LETTER_NO , LETTER_SEND_ID FROM TBL_LETTER WHERE LETTER_SEND_ID = #{letterSendId} GROUP BY LETTER_SEND_ID )T2 ON TU.USER_ID= T2.LETTER_SEND_ID

SELECT l.letter_no AS letterNo, l.letter_receive_yn AS letterReceiveYn, l.letter_color_no AS letterColorNo, u.user_nickname AS senderNickname FROM tbl_letter l JOIN tbl_user u ON l.letter_send_id = u.user_id WHERE l.letter_receive_id = #{userId} ORDER BY l.regist_dt DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{size} ROWS ONLY

SELECT l.letter_no AS letterNo, l.letter_receive_yn AS letterReceiveYn, l.letter_color_no AS letterColorNo, u.user_nickname AS receiverNickname FROM tbl_letter l JOIN tbl_user u ON l.letter_receive_id = u.user_id WHERE l.letter_send_id = #{userId} ORDER BY l.regist_dt DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{size} ROWS ONLY
select color_name as colorName, color_hex as colorHex, color_rgb as colorRgb, color_text as colorText from tbl_color where letter_color_no = #{letterColorNo}

SELECT l.letter_no as letterNo, l.letter_title as letterTitle, l.letter_content as letterContent, l.letter_color_no as letterColorNo, l.letter_receive_yn as letterReceiveYn, sender.user_nickname as senderNickname, receiver.user_nickname as receiverNickname, l.regist_dt as registDate FROM tbl_letter l LEFT JOIN tbl_user sender ON l.letter_send_id = sender.user_id LEFT JOIN tbl_user receiver ON l.letter_receive_id = receiver.user_id WHERE l.letter_no = #{letterNo}

SELECT l.letter_no as letterNo, l.letter_title as letterTitle, l.letter_content as letterContent, l.letter_color_no as letterColorNo, l.letter_receive_yn as letterReceiveYn, sender.user_nickname as senderNickname, l.regist_dt as registDate FROM tbl_letter l LEFT JOIN tbl_user sender ON l.letter_send_id = sender.user_id WHERE l.letter_no = #{letterNo}
